search.query: index="keystrokes" type=KeyDown | eval keystone="<<<" + sourcetype + ">>>" | transaction endswith="keyCode=36 OR keyCode=49 OR keyCode=52 OR keyCode=76 OR keyCode=115 OR keyCode=116 OR keyCode=119 OR keyCode=121 OR keyCode=123 OR keyCode=124 OR keyCode=125 OR keyCode=126" mvlist=true keeporphans=true | strcat chars keystone word | rex mode=sed field=word "s/(\<\<\<keystrokes\>\>\>)//g" | table word app | rex mode=sed field=word "s/\s(?!\<)//g"
